prompts: Create a rabbit-like Pokemon that has long, fluffy ears and a playful demeanor.
I want a cute, bipedal Pokemon with soft fur and a graceful appearance.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon with cream and brown colors, embodying elegance and speed.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a Lopunny, with a focus on agility and charm.
Imagine a Pokemon that can hop gracefully, showcasing its beautiful fur and strong legs.
Design a Pokemon inspired by rabbits, featuring large ears and a warm, friendly expression.
Give me a Pokemon with a soft, fluffy coat that is both adorable and athletic.
